title: Volibear too strong?
body:
I find it extremely disturbing that he is extremely tanky and still can bite squishies for around half health, has an extreme movespeed boost with a toss and bonus damage, and a built in statikk shiv per hit.

I believe something is wrong here, and that he should be considered with a nerf.

replies.body:
Looks at Volibears kit.

Realizes you don't know what you are talking about.

Kit him. you can counter him easy by CC him and {{summoner:14}} him is his passive comes up. It's not that hard to take a volibear out. if you new what you were doing you can take him out. Also {{item:3153}} and {{item:3151}} bro
His dmg is over the top. I dont agree with nerfing in general, but i agree that he is overpowered
